Diamond::  
She watched him. He seamed very intelegent and rather pleasent to be 
around.  

"Yes. I suppose your right. Bending a bots will to yours does come in 
handy. But then again. It can back fire. I proved that."

She looked at her wrist with the wires sticking out of it. 

"Yeah,  I proved what can happen when it backfires."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DevilDuer::
> 
> DevilDuer leans on the machine, his eyes glinting. This was the 
first 
> intellegent conversation he's had in a long time...
> 
> "Well, take that bot that saved me on the Pred ship. I got him 
> killed, of course, but he really wasn' that bad. Well, at least not 
> when he jumped to my every command. A bit mind warpin' can go far 
> more than assassination. If I wulda killed 'im, I wouldn' be here 
> right now."
